notice.ch: 課程名稱：航空工程概論。建議先修課程：熱力學、流體力學。

remark.ch: 課程名稱：航空工程概論。建議先修課程：熱力學、流體力學。

goal.ch: 本課程之目的乃對於航空工程技術及原理作廣泛、深入而淺出的介紹，以期學生能瞭解航太工程之領域分類、發展歷程、技術現況、工作原理、飛行載具種類、飛機零組件、航空工程系統整合以及未來走向能有基本的認識，同時對於航空工程之相關技術都能有基本的了解。本課程將以課堂授課為主，教授學生航空工程技術、飛行相關原理、推進系統技術與民用航空等相關知識。本課程之基本學科知識包含基本數學、工程力學、熱力學及流體力學，學科內容將包含熱流基礎理論與工程實務。
goal.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the technologies and fundamentals of aeronautical engineering in order to let students understand the classification, history of development, current technology status, working principles, types of aerial vehicles, components of airplanes, system integration of aeronautical engineering and future trend of aeronautical engineering. In addition, students are expected to have fundamental understanding of aeronautical engineering-related technologies. In this course, the knowledge of aeronautical engineering technologies, flight principles, propulsion systems and civil aviation will be lectured. The basic subjects of this course include basic mathematics, engineering mechanics, thermodynamics and fluid mechanics. Both the fundamental thermal and fluid theories and practical engineering knowledge will be included in the contents of this course.

outline.ch:
1.航空工程技術發展歷史與現況
2.飛行載具種類(定翼機、旋翼機、民用航空、軍用戰機)
3.基本空氣動力學
4.飛機飛行原理與飛行性能分析方法
5.飛機零組件與作用
6.推進系統
7.飛行姿態與穩定性
8. 飛具設計概念
9.基本民用航空知識
outline.en:
1.The history and current status of the development of aeronautical engineering
2. Types of aerial vehicle (fixed-wing, rotor, aviation and military airplanes)
3. Basic aerodynamics
4. Principle of flight, and evaluation approaches of flight performance
5. Components and functions of an aircraft
6. Propulsion systems
7. Flight stability and control
8. Basic concepts of aerial vehicle design
9. Basic aviation knowledge
